original_text: And the rest, some on boards, and some on broken pieces of the ship. And so it came to pass, that they escaped all safe to land.
korean_text: 그 남은 사람들은 널조각 혹은 배 물건에 의지하여 나가게 하니 마침내 사람들이 다 상륙하여 구조되니라

sentences.original_text: and some on broken pieces of the ship
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 사람들은 부서진 배의 조각을 타고

sentences.original_text: And so it came to pass
that they escaped all safe to land
